section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:AreaViewCameraFollowCameraRotateMouse
This class roate the camera entity based on the motion of the mouse CameraZoomConstraintCameraDefinitionFrontBackSorting
This class offers the most simple sorting FrontBackSortingManager
This class manages all the game object that runs the different sorting methods FrontBackTwoPointSort
This class offers a 2 points for the process of determination of whether the character's sprite is above or blow the host's sprite IFrontBackSorting
This class aims to generalize the possible sorting method for 2d sprites in a top down view IInteractableIMovement
The IMovement interface acts as a generalization of all type of movements in the game MonologueDataMonologueManagerMovement
This class handles all movement related behaviors in 3D The host object (mentioned in blow) is the object which this script will perform its functions on Movement2D
This class handles all movement related behavior in 2D MovementData
The container for all movement related datas in the game Can be created in the Unity Editor MovementRootMotion
This class move the host object by ultilize root motion in the animations of the host object OnCreateTriggerOnPlayerSeeObjectPlayerController
This class processes the player's input and call the coresspondence behavior to perform the intended action StateStateStackTweenerUltilities
